meta.purpose: AI-generated image aligned to Perplexity branding

concept.title: Cosmic Vista from Observatory
concept.objective: Render a wide, eye-level view from a minimalist observatory interior onto an expansive alien canyon beneath a majestic planetary sky—photoreal base with restrained conceptual surreal cues—aligned to Perplexity’s brand.
concept.brand_message: intelligent, accessible, human-centric; no gimmicks, no fluff; answers that make sense

realism.base: photorealistic, ultra-detailed, low-light interior with cosmic exterior illumination

controls.texture_fidelity: sleek matte metallic interior framework with subtle panel reflections; clear, expansive glass with controlled reflections; rugged stratified sandstone micro-detail; realistic atmospheric perspective; precise stellar points without smear

surreal.approach: magical realism—grand celestial scale and dreamlike star density rendered believably via atmosphere and disciplined glow
motifs: giant pale-yellow planetary body with soft halo
distant smaller planets/moons at varying depths
dense star field with faint nebula wisps
subtle lens-like glows as abstract orbs (non-UI)

cues: vintage color grading: warm canyon earth tones contrasted with cool deep navy/teal sky
subtle chromatic aberration at extreme edges
classic editorial minimalism with strong negative space and clear hierarchy

palette.rules: balance warm earth terrain and vegetation with cool cosmic sky; unify with planetary pale-yellow highlights; avoid neon oversaturation

lighting.type: soft ambient mixed with directional planetary light
lighting.shadows: long, soft-edged shadows from the figure on interior floor; subtle terrain shadows from diffused ambient; controlled interior reflections
lighting.volumetrics: thin atmospheric haze in canyon and along horizon; soft halo around planetary body; faint starlight diffusion without heavy bloom

composition.framing: wide shot through a large rectangular panoramic window
composition.perspective: eye-level, centered behind a silhouetted human figure
structure: foreground: observatory interior edge with vegetation clusters and central human silhouette
midground: canyon basin and mesas with river valley reflecting star glow
background: planetary sky with stars, planets, subtle nebulae
composition.focal_hierarchy: primary: silhouetted human figure at center; secondary: giant pale-yellow planet; tertiary: towering cliffs illuminated by cosmic light

core_concepts: central silhouetted human figure, hands behind back, neutral stance
rectangular window framing expansive alien canyon
giant planetary body with soft halo and distant smaller orbs
river valley with faint starlight reflection
subjects.human_element: single figure centered, back to viewer, small relative scale to emphasize grandeur
objects: sleek matte metallic interior framework with subtle geometric paneling
clear glass with controlled reflection (no HUD/UI)
subjects.constraints: no direct logo recreation; no HUD/UI overlays; celestial elements must remain elegant and believable

features: tall vertical cliffs with rugged stratified layers
wide river valley cutting through basin with subtle reflective sheen
terrain.material: reddish sandstone with moderate reflectivity under celestial lighting

vegetation.density: medium-high in foreground, sparse in background
pattern: foreground: lush mixed flora around window edge and interior threshold
midground: uniform shrub/tree clusters on canyon floor

foreground: spindly grasses in ochre and dark green
midground: medium shrubs and low trees in orange-to-crimson foliage
background: low-density shrub clusters blending to rock

content: dense star field with multiple bright points
one large pale-yellow planet dominating right side
faint nebula haze and a few abstract lens-like glow orbs
sky.color_gradient: deep navy apex blending into teal/turquoise near horizon with pale-yellow planetary halo

ban_list: sci-fi HUD/UI overlays or holographic interfaces

technical.output_notes: archive prompt, parameters, seed, and selected image with metadata

model_specific.system: Photoreal base with restrained conceptual surrealism; editorial-modern retro cues; warm–cool palette discipline; atmosphere-driven cosmic scale; clean interior minimalism.

content: Render a wide, eye-level scene from inside a minimalist observatory with a large rectangular panoramic window.

Foreground: centered silhouetted male figure, hands behind back, neutral stance; sparse interior vegetation clusters near the window threshold; sleek matte metallic floor with subtle geometric panel reflections.

Midground: an eroded canyon basin with stratified sandstone cliffs and scattered mesas; a wide river valley reflecting faint starlight; vegetation density transitions from medium at foreground to sparse into distance.

Background: a majestic planetary sky with a large pale-yellow planet to the right with a soft halo, additional smaller moons/planets at varied depths, dense star field with faint nebula wisps; keep star points crisp and believable.

Color discipline: terrain and vegetation warm earth tones (#C1440E, #D2691E, #E2725B; coral/amber/purple accents) contrasted with cool sky tones (#001f33, #0A2A43) and pale-yellow planetary highlight (#FFD580); gentle accent lights (#FFF8E1, #E6E6FA, #FAD02E); avoid neon.

Lighting: soft ambient mixed with directional planetary light; long, soft-edged shadow from the figure across the interior floor; thin haze in canyon and along horizon; subtle planetary halo and restrained starlight diffusion.

Composition: strong central symmetry with the figure; apply rule of thirds to horizon and planetary placement; maintain generous negative space in the sky panes; ensure window frame lines are straight and architectural.
Finish: editorial-modern polish with soft fine grain and subtle chromatic aberration at edges; no HUD/UI overlays or legible text.
prompt.negative: blur, chaotic vegetation, cartoonish, neon, HUD/UI, heavy bloom, warped window lines, over-busy stars
